page.title: 17FACTS ABOUT STAR
page.content:
{STAR HEARTS}is our local football team. Their strip is a purple top & white shorts & purple and white socks. They play at Treaton Park. {OTHER {TEAMS }include under '21's', Youth Club '5 aside', Star School '5 aside'. {YEARLY EVENTS}are the local Gala, The Flower Show and Dances & Parties.
{STAR PRIMARY SCHOOL ------------------- The oldest part of the school was built in{1815.}In this part there are 2 classrooms used as 1 large classroom for P1-3. At one time there was a county library in the building. This is now a large cupboard in the P1-3 classroom. On the outside of the school is a War Memorial remembering 8 local people killed in the First World War. The newest part of the school was added on in{1924,}this is P4-7 room.
